Generation VIII.Sword: When it heats up, its body temperature reaches about 1,500 degrees Fahrenheit . It lashes its body like a whip and launches itself at enemies.
Generation VIII.Shield: While its burning body is already dangerous on its own, this excessively hostile Pokémon also has large and very sharp fangs.
